paper.title: Optimal Pricing of Configurable Products using Machine Learning
paper.abstract: In this paper, we proposed a Machine Learning (ML) based methodology to optimally price configurable products. The methodology uses an ensemble of ML models to forecast the demand; along with an optimization framework to find the prices and upgrades that achieve highest business goals. The novelty of proposed methodology is providing an intuitive upgrade pricing experience for customers while targeting maximum objective(s) attainment for business. It was demonstrated that an ensemble of ML models can achieve errors lower than 30-40 percent allowing effective pricing of a portfolio of configurable products. The prices were close to the current manually generated prices by business experts.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是使用机器学习方法对可配置产品进行最优定价，虽然提到了投资组合（portfolio）一词，但这里的portfolio指的是可配置产品的组合，而非金融领域的投资组合管理。论文的核心技术与衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理均无直接关联。
